name: Lost in the Attick
description:
Download, decompress & play!

 

Your dad sent you, a 9-year-old, to the... dark, haunted attick? He wants you to bring him some items with the help of a flashlight. It's quite dark, so don't let it run out of battery. Can you get him what he wants?

Jam Site: 
UADE

Jam Year: 
2021

Platforms: 
MS Windows

Tools And Technologies: 
Unity (any product)

Technology Notes: 
Aseprite; Procreate; Ableton Live 10; GitHub Desktop
